title: Hover Shadow Box Animation
description: In this lab, we will explore the basics of CSS programming and how to use it to style and format HTML documents. You will learn how to add colors, fonts, and backgrounds to your web pages, as well as how to apply different styling techniques such as hover effects and animations. By the end of this lab, you will be able to create visually appealing and interactive web pages using CSS.
